name: Fidget Spinner App-New Tappy Finger hand Simulator
name_original: Fidget Spinner App-New Tappy Finger hand Simulator
description:
The best cure for your excess energy!

Fidget Spinner helps you relax and relieve stress with just a few simple spins.

Stop nail-biting, pen-twirling or spending hundreds of dollars on expensive spinner toys.

Here, you can try different spinners for free and spin them for as long as you want!

More spinners will be added so stay tuned for upcoming updates!
